title: Meditation Herbal Candle
description: Take a deep breath, refocus your mind, and make the space to heal and rebuild. Light our Meditation candle to soothe away the stress and irritations of chaotic schedules. Notes of deep Sandalwood and luscious Cashmere nourish your soul as light hints of herbal Chamomile and pure Vanilla lift your mood. The healing presence of Labradorite stones, Holy Basil, Frankincense, and Gotu Kola to ground you in your practice. Natural Soy - Premium Ingredients - Clean Burning 9 oz. Hand Crafted for You in the U.S.
